raw_text:
Spirit awards hail Sideways
 
 The comedy Sideways has dominated this year's Independent Spirit Awards, winning all six of the awards for which it was nominated.
 
 It was named best film while Alexander Payne won best director and best screenplay, along with writing partner Jim Taylor. It also won acting awards for stars Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church and Virginia Madsen. Sideways is tipped to do well at Sunday's Oscars, with five nominations.
 
 The awards, now in their 20th year, are given to films made outside the traditional studio system, and are traditionally held the day before the Oscars. Other winners included Catalina Sandino Moreno, who took best actress for her role as a drug smuggler in the Colombian drama Maria Full of Grace. Moreno is also nominated for best actress at the Oscars. The best first screenplay award went to Joshua Marston for Maria Full of Grace. Scrubs star Zach Braff won the award for best first feature for Garden State, which he wrote, directed and starred in. Oscar-nominated euthanasia film The Sea Inside from Spain won best foreign film, while Metallica: Some Kind Of Monster was awarded best documentary. Actor Rodrigo de la Serna took the best debut performance prize for The Motorcycle Diaries. The awards are voted for by the 9,000 members of the Independent Feature Project/Los Angeles, which includes actors, directors, writers and other industry professionals. Last year's big winner, Lost In Translation, went on to win the Oscar for best original screenplay, for writer-director Sofia Coppola.
llama3.2:1b: The comedy film "Sideways" won six awards at this year's Independent Spirit Awards, including Best Film, Best Director (Alexander Payne), and Best Screenplay with writing partners Jim Taylor and Thomas Haden Church. The film also took awards for acting performances by Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, and Virginia Madsen.

Catalina Sandino Moreno won best actress for her role in "Maria Full of Grace", Joshua Marston won best first screenplay for the same film, and Zach Braff won best first feature for "Garden State".  "The Sea Inside" was awarded best foreign film, and "Metallica: Some Kind Of Monster" won best documentary.

qwen2.5:3b: Sideways won all six nominations at this year's Independent Spirit Awards, including Best Film, Best Director (Alexander Payne), Best Screenplay (Alexander Payne & Jim Taylor), and acting awards for Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, and Virginia Madsen. The film is expected to perform well at the Oscars with five nominations. Other winners include Catalina Sandino Moreno for Best Actress in Maria Full of Grace, Joshua Marston for Best First Screenplay in Maria Full of Grace, Zach Braff for Best First Feature in Garden State, Spain's The Sea Inside for Best Foreign Film, and Rodrigo de la Serna for Best Debut Performance in The Motorcycle Diaries.
opencoder:1.5b:
Sideways has won six awards: best film, best director, best screenplay, acting awards for three stars, and the Oscars. They have also won an Oscars nomination, which is a prestigious award given to outstanding films.
 
The movie was named "best film" while Alexander Payne won "best director". He also won "best writing partner" - Jim Taylor.

Sideways has won five Oscars nominations and a vote from the Independent Feature Project/Los Angeles.
smollm:1.7b:
The spirit awards hail Sideways, which won six of the seven nominations it received this year. The film was nominated for its outstanding performances by Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church and Virginia Madsen, as well as its writing by Jim Taylor. It also won the best director award, with Alexander Payne winning the award for Best Director while Best Screenplay was awarded to Paul Giamatti. Sideways is tipped to do well at Sunday's Oscars, with five nominations, including Best Actor for Paul Giamatti and Best Actress for Virginia Madsen.

The Independent Spirit Awards are given to films made outside the traditional studio system, and are traditionally held the day before the Oscars. Other winners included Catalina Sandino Moreno, who took Best Actress for her role as a drug smuggler in the Colombian drama Maria Full of Grace. Moreno is also nominated for Best First Screenplay for Garden State, which she wrote, directed and starred in. The best first feature award went to Joshua Marston for Maria Full of Grace. Scrubs star Zach Braff won the Award for Best First Feature for Garden State, while Metallica: Some Kind Of Monster was awarded Best Foreign Film, while Best Original Screenplay was awarded to the film's screenwriter, Rodrigo de la Serna.

The Independent Spirit Awards are voted for by the 9,000 members of the Independent Feature Project/Los Angeles, which includes actors, directors, writers and other industry professionals. Last year's big winner, Lost In Translation, went on to win the Oscar for Best Original Screenplay, for writer-director Sofia Coppola.

So, to summarize this into plain text while preserving key ideas and details, I need to capture who it is, what awards it won, its significance, other winners, and its position among other films at the Oscars.
</think>

The Sideways film won six Independent Spirit Awards, including Best Film, with acting and screenplay winning awards. It received five Oscars nominations. The 20th Spirit Awards are held a day before the Oscars and feature films made outside traditional studios. Notable winners included Catalina Sandino Moreno for Maria Full of Grace, Oscar-nominated The Sea Inside, and Rodrigo de la Serna's Best Debut Performance.
tinyllama:1.1b:
Pas de cours au prix d’excellence

L'Académie américaine des arts et sciences a remporté tous les six prix décernés cette année lors du 20e prix Independent Spirit Awards, appelé aujourd'hui les « Oscars de la comédie ». C'est le premier titre mondial pour Sideways, qui a été nommé meilleur film tandis que le scénariste et producteur Alexander Payne a remporté le meilleur réalisateur et l'auteur James Taulier. Les autres récompenses ont eu pour cible des films réalisés hors du système de production cinématographique traditionnel, ainsi qu'un petit ensemble de récompenses nominées pour les Oscars. Outre les cinq nominations, d'autres vainqueurs comprenaient Catalina Sandino Moreno, qui a remporté le premier rôle féminin au titre de la célébration du 28e anniversaire des prix Independent Spirit Awards, et Zach Braff qui a remporté le meilleur premier film pour Maria Full of Grace. Surtout, la meilleure comédie étrangère a été récompensée pour The Sea Inside du Spains, tandis que les documentaires Metallica: Some Kind Of Monster ont reçu la plus grande distinction au travers de leur réalisation et de leur début d'expérience. Les critiques et acteurs professionnels membres de l'association Indie Feature Project ont récoltés le meilleur de la comédie dans les années passées, qui auraient été attribuées à Lost In Translation.
tinydolphin:1.1b: The 20th annual Independent Spirit Awards took place this weekend, honoring outstanding achievements in cinema outside of the traditional studio system. Among the winners was comedy Sideways, which dominated the evening, winning all six of the awards for which it was nominated. Alexander Payne and Jim Taylor were awarded best director, while Paul Giamatti received a well-deserved best actor trophy. The film also won in two other categories: Best Film and Best First Feature. This year's awards ceremony took place on the day before the Academy Awards (Oscars), further demonstrating the importance of independent cinema in the industry. Other notable winners included Catalina Sandino Moreno, who received a best actress nomination for her role as a drug smuggler in Maria Full of Grace; Zach Braff, who won the best first screenplay award for his script for Garden State; and Joshua Marston, who claimed the Best First Feature award for his film, Maria Full of Grace. The Sea Inside from Spain took home the best foreign film prize, while Metallica: Some Kind of Monster won best documentary. This year's voters included 9,000 industry professionals from across various branches of the film industry, including actors, directors, writers and other industry professionals. The previous winner, Lost in Translation, secured a second consecutive victory, winning best original screenplay for Sofia Coppola.
phi:2.7b: Sideways won all six awards at the Independent Spirit Awards, including best film, director, and screenwriting. It is predicted to do well at Sunday's Oscars with five nominations. Other winners include Catalina Sandino Moreno for best actress in Maria Full of Grace and Zach Braff for best first feature in Garden State. The Independent Feature Project/Los Angeles members voted for the awards, which are typically held before the Oscars.

Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, and Virginia Madsen also won acting awards. The movie is predicted to do well at the Oscars with five nominations. The Spirit Awards honor films outside the traditional studio system, while the Oscars celebrate a separate set of achievements in cinema.

Notable actors include Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, and Virginia Madsen who received acting awards. Sideways has a strong chance to perform well at the Oscars with five nominations. The Independent Spirit Awards honor films produced outside of the traditional studio system, held annually on the day before the Oscars. Past winners have included Lost In Translation which won Best Original Screenplay.
granite3.1-dense:2b: Sideways, a critically acclaimed comedy from director Alexander Payne, dominated this year's Independent Spirit Awards, securing all six of its nominations and winning Best Film, Director (Payne), Screenplay (Payne & Jim Taylor), and Acting awards for Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, and Virginia Madsen. The film is favored to fare well at the upcoming Oscars, with five nominations. Other notable winners included Catalina Sandino Moreno for Best Actress in Maria Full of Grace (also nominated for an Oscar), Joshua Marston for best first screenplay for Maria Full of Grace, Zach Braff for Garden State, The Sea Inside as Best Foreign Film, Metallica: Some Kind Of Monster for Best Documentary, and Rodrigo de la Serna for Best Debut Performance in The Motorcycle Diaries. These awards, now in their 20th year, recognize films produced outside the traditional studio system, voted on by 9,000 members of the Independent Feature Project/Los Angeles.

The awards, celebrating independent films, were held the day before the Oscars. Other winners included Catalina Sandino Moreno (best actress for Maria Full of Grace), Joshua Marston (best first screenplay for Maria Full of Grace), Zach Braff (best first feature for Garden State), The Sea Inside (best foreign film), Metallica: Some Kind of Monster (best documentary), and Rodrigo de la Serna (best debut performance for The Motorcycle Diaries). The awards are voted on by 9,000 members of the Independent Feature Project/Los Angeles. Last year’s big winner, Lost in Translation, later won an Oscar for best original screenplay.
